evidence: "This project shows how to build an `MFEM` `NonlinearFormIntegrator` on top of the `MGIS` library." (indicates it is an extension/component to be used within MFEM, i.e., a dependency)

"Some examples of MFEM-MGIS use (with mesh inputs) are stored on another repository here: `MFEM-MGIS-EXAMPLES`." (shows it is used to run scientific examples, implying direct role in simulations/analyses)
README only references GitHub pages for docs and examples and links to installation guidelines, with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository.
